snippet: F.B.I. investigators are trying to find whoever set off a makeshift bomb outside an N.A.A.C.P. office in Colorado Springs, in what could be a bias attack or a case of domestic terrorism.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation is investigating makeshift bomb that was set off outside NAACP office in Colorado Springs, Colo.
lead_paragraph: F.B.I. investigators are trying to find whoever set off a makeshift bomb outside an N.A.A.C.P. office in Colorado Springs, in what could be a bias attack or a case of domestic terrorism.

headline.main: Scorch Marks and Questions Linger After N.A.A.C.P. Bombing in Colorado
headline.print_headline: Scorch Marks and Questions Linger After N.A.A.C.P. Bombing in Colorado

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
